source_caption_data.pre_caption: This stunning time-lapse video showcases the vibrant green Aurora Borealis over a snowy, tree-lined landscape. The celestial lights dance and swirl across the dark, starry sky, shifting in shape and intensity. The only movement in this serene winter scene is the mesmerizing undulation of the aurora.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This stunning time-lapse video showcases the vibrant green Aurora Borealis over a snowy, tree-lined landscape. The celestial lights dance and swirl across the dark, starry sky, shifting in shape and intensity. The only movement in this serene winter scene is the mesmerizing undulation of the aurora.
